getRecome.label: 获取热门推荐
getRecome.value: function (context, params) {return new Promise(resolve => {const {baseUrl, source} = params;const {http, ERR_OK, ERR_FALSE, Book, Bookshelf, replaceHTML} = context;http.get(baseUrl, {headers: {'user-agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/78.0.3904.108 Safari/537.36'}}).then(res => {let str = replaceHTML(res.data);let inner = str.match(/<div[^>]*class=([

]?)banner_inner\1[^>]*>*([\s\S]*?)/)[0];let astr = inner.match(/]*([\s\S]*?)/ig);let hotBooks = [];if ( astr ) {astr.forEach(a => {hotBooks.push(new Book({bookId: a.match(/href="*([\s\S]*?)"/)[1].replace(baseUrl, ''),title: a.match(/title="*([\s\S]*?)"/)[1],cover: a.match(/src="*([\s\S]*?)"/)[1],type: 'comic',source: source}))})}let updates = [];let upcons = str.match(/]*class=([

]?)update_con\1[^>]*>*([\s\S]*?)/ig);if ( upcons ) {upcons.forEach(upcon => {let lis = upcon.match(/]*>*([\s\S]*?)/ig);if ( lis ) {lis.forEach(li => {updates.push(new Book({bookId: li.match(/href="*([\s\S]*?)"/)[1].replace(baseUrl, ''),title: li.match(/title="*([\s\S]*?)"/)[1],cover: 'https:' + li.match(/src="*([\s\S]*?)"/)[1],author: li.match(/]*class=([

]?)(banner_rank widthEigRight con_right|youn_mh_r con_right widthEigRight)\1[^>]*>*([\s\S]*?)/ig);if ( tabs ) {tabs.forEach((tab, key) => {hotTops.push(new Bookshelf({shelfId: 'rank_' + key + '_' + source,title: tab.match(/]*>*([\s\S]*?)/)[1],style: 'top',type: 'comic',source: source}));let content = tab.match(/]*class=([

]?)tab-content tab-content-selected\1[^>]*>*([\s\S]*?)/)[0];let lis = content.match(/]*>*([\s\S]*?)/ig);if ( lis ) {lis.forEach(li => {let img = li.match(/]*>/);let cover = img ? 'https:' + img[0].match(/src="*([\s\S]*?)"/)[1] : '';let rankCon = li.match(/]*class=([

]?)rank_first_con\1[^>]*>*([\s\S]*?)/);let author = rankCon ? rankCon[0].match(/]*>*([\s\S]*?)

/ig)[0].match(/]*>*([\s\S]*?)

/)[1].replace('作者：', '') : '';let lastChapter = rankCon ? rankCon[0].match(/]*>*([\s\S]*?)

/ig)[1].match(/]*>*([\s\S]*?)

/)[1].replace('更新至', '') : li.match(/]*class=([

]?)rank_tabs_sec\1[^>]*>*([\s\S]*?)/)[2];hotTops[key].book.push(new Book({bookId: li.match(/href="*([\s\S]*?)"/)[1].replace(baseUrl, ''),title: li.match(/title="*([\s\S]*?)"/)[1],cover: cover,author: author,lastChapter: lastChapter,type: 'comic',source: source}));})}})}let populars = [];let popcons = str.match(/]*class=([

]?)tip\1[^>]*>*([\s\S]*?)/)[0].match(/]*>*([\s\S]*?)

/)[1].replace('更新至', ''),type: 'comic',source: source}));})}resolve({code: ERR_OK,data: {banners: [],hotBooks: hotBooks,populars: populars,updates: updates,hotTops: hotTops,source: source}})}).catch(() => {resolve({code: ERR_FALSE,data: {banners: [],hotBooks: [],populars: [],updates: [],hotTops: [],source: source}})})})}

search.label: 搜索功能
search.value: function (context, params) {return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {const { baseUrl, source } = params;const { http, ERR_OK, ERR_FALSE, Book } = context;http.get(baseUrl + '/pager.ashx', {params: {t: 3,f: 0,d: 'Sat%20Aug%2021%202021%2009:31:43%20GMT+0800%20(中国标准时间)',title: params.keyword,pageSize: 12,pageindex: params.page[source]},headers: {Referer: baseUrl,Host: baseUrl.replace('http://', ''),}}).then((res) => {let list = [];if ( res.data?.length > 0 ) {res.data.forEach(item => {list.push(new Book({bookId: item.Url,cover: item.Pic,title: item.Title,style: item.TagList ? item.TagList.toString().replace(/,/g, ' ') : '',author: item.Author.toString().replace(/,/g, ' '),desc: item.Content,lastChapter: item.LastUpdateInfo,createTime: item.AddTime,updateTime: item.LastPartTime,isEnd: item.Status == '连载中' ? false : true,type: 'comic',source: source}))})}resolve({code: ERR_OK,data: {list: list,isLastPage: list.length < 12,currentPage: params.page[source],source: source}})}).catch((err) => {resolve({code: ERR_FALSE,data: {list: [],isLastPage: false,currentPage: params.page[source] - 1,source: source}})})})}

getTypeList.label: 分类列表
getTypeList.value: function (context, params) {return new Promise(resolve => {const {baseUrl,source} = params;const {http,ERR_OK,ERR_FALSE,replaceHTML} = context;http.get(baseUrl + '/manga-list', {headers: {Referer: baseUrl,Host: baseUrl.replace('http://', ''),'user-agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/78.0.3904.108 Safari/537.36'}}).then((res) => {let str = replaceHTML(res.data);let classList = str.match(/<div[^>]*class=([

]?)class-line\1[^>]*>*([\s\S]*?)/)[0];let as = classList.match(/]*>*([\s\S]*?)/ig);let typeList = [];as.forEach(a => {let ids = a.match(/href="*(\S*)"/)[1].match(//manga-list-*(\S*)-0-10//);let id = ids ? ids[1] : 0;let title = a.match(/]*>*([\s\S]*?)/)[1];typeList.push({label: title,value: id,source: source})});resolve({code: ERR_OK,data: {list: typeList,source: source}})}).catch((err) => {resolve({code: ERR_FALSE,data: {list: [],source: source}})})})}

getTypeDetail.label: 分类详情
getTypeDetail.value: function (context, params) {return new Promise(resolve => {const { baseUrl, source } = params;const { http, ERR_OK, ERR_FALSE, replaceHTML, Book } = context;http.get(baseUrl + '/manga-list/mangabz.ashx', {params: {action: 'getclasscomics',pageindex: params.page,pagesize: 21,tagid: params.id,status: 0,sort: 10},headers: {Referer: baseUrl,Host: baseUrl.replace('http://', '')}}).then((res) => {let list = [];if ( res.data.UpdateComicItems?.length > 0 ) {res.data.UpdateComicItems.forEach(item => {list.push(new Book({bookId: '/' + item.UrlKey + '/',cover: item.ShowPicUrlB,title: item.Title,style: params.title,author: item.Author.toString().replace(/,/g, ' '),desc: item.Content,lastChapter: item.ComicPart,createTime: item.ShelvesTime.replace(' 更新', ''),updateTime: item.LastUpdateTime.replace(' 发布', ''),isEnd: item.Status == 1 ? false : true,type: 'comic',source: source}))})}resolve({code: ERR_OK,data: {list: list,isLastPage: list.length < 21,currentPage: params.page,source: source}})}).catch((err) => {resolve({code: ERR_FALSE,data: {list: [],isLastPage: false,currentPage: params.page - 1,source: source}})})})}

getDetail.label: 书籍详情
getDetail.value: function (context, params) {return new Promise(resolve => {const { baseUrl, source } = params;const { http, ERR_OK, ERR_FALSE, replaceHTML, Chapter, htmlDecodeByRegExp, getTag } = context;http.get(baseUrl + params.id, {headers: {Referer: baseUrl,Host: baseUrl.replace('http://', ''),'user-agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/78.0.3904.108 Safari/537.36'}}).then((res) => {let str = replaceHTML(res.data);let cover = str.match(/<img[^>]*class=([

]?)detail-info-tip\1[^>]*>*([\s\S]*?)

/)[0];let spans = tip.match(/]*>*([\s\S]*?)/ig);let author = '';let style = '';let isEnd = false;spans.forEach((span, key) => {switch (key) {case 0:author = span.match(/]*>*([\s\S]*?)/)[1];break;case 1:isEnd = span.match(/狀態：]*>*([\s\S]*?)/)[1] == '連載中' ? false : true;break;default:let items = span.match(/]*class=([

]?)detail-info-content\1[^>]*>*([\s\S]*?)

/)[2];let conas = desc.match(/]*>*([\s\S]*?)/ig);if ( conas ) {conas.forEach(con => {desc = desc.replace(con, '');})}let hideCon = desc.match(/]*>*([\s\S]*?)/ig);if ( hideCon ) {hideCon.forEach(con => {desc = desc.replace(con.match(/]*>*([\s\S]*?)/)[0], con.match(/]*>*([\s\S]*?)/)[1]);})}let tag = getTag(source, title + '_' + desc + '_' + style);let chapters = [];let chapterStr = str.match(/]*class=([

]?)detail-list-form-item (hide)?\1[^>]*>*([\s\S]*?)/ig);if ( chapterStr ) {chapterStr.reverse();chapterStr.forEach((chapter, key) => {let chapterTitle = chapter.match(/]*>*([\s\S]*?)/)[1];let span = chapter.match(/]*>*([\s\S]*?)/);chapterTitle = chapterTitle.replace(span[0], span[1]);chapters.push(new Chapter({id: chapter.match(/href="*([\s\S]*?)"/)[1],title: chapterTitle.replace(/\s/g, ''),chapter: key + 1,isStart: key== 0,isEnd: key == chapterStr.length - 1,source: source}));})}resolve({code: ERR_OK,data: {bookInfo: {title: htmlDecodeByRegExp(title),cover: cover,author: author,style: style,size: chapters.length + '章节',desc: htmlDecodeByRegExp(desc),isEnd: isEnd,tag: tag},guess: [],sames: [],other: [],chapters: chapters,source: source}})}).catch(() => {resolve({code: ERR_FALSE,data: {bookInfo: '',guess: [],sames: [],other: [],chapters: [],source: source}})})})}

getContent.label: 书籍内容
getContent.value: function (context, params) {return new Promise(resolve => {const { baseUrl, source } = params;const { http, ERR_OK, ERR_FALSE } = context;http.get(baseUrl + params.id, {headers: {Referer: baseUrl,Host: baseUrl.replace('http://', ''),'user-agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; CPU iPhone OS 11_0 like Mac OS X) AppleWebKit/604.1.38 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/11.0 Mobile/15A372 Safari/604.1'}}).then((res) => {let contents = [];let body = res.data.match(/<body[^>]*([\s\S]*?)</body>/)[0];let scripts = body.match(/<script[^>]*([\s\S]*?)</script>/ig);let jsStr = scripts[11].match(/<script[^>]*([\s\S]*?)</script>/)[1].slice(2);let func = jsStr.substring(jsStr.indexOf('(') + 1, jsStr.lastIndexOf(')'));let imageStr = eval('(' + func + ')');func = 'function () { return' + imageStr.replace('var newImgs=', '') + '}';let images = eval('(' + func + ')');images().forEach(img => {contents.push(img);});resolve({code: ERR_OK,data: {contents: contents,source: source}})}).catch(() => {resolve({code: ERR_FALSE,data: {contents: [],source: source}})})})}
